body_content.explanation: someone who is using a bed in a hospital although they no longer need hospital treatment, because they do not have anywhere else to go where they can be cared for safely. Some people consider this word offensive:
examples: The hospital is currently accommodating 25 bed blockers who are healthy enough to leave.
Ralph could have ended up in residential care before his time, or as a hospital bed-blocker because there's no one to care for him back home.
